extendedInfo.description: Join the food revolution! Based on the best selling book series, the Eat This, Not That! Restaurant app is the complete no-diet weight-loss solution. Discover thousands of simple food swaps, track calories, and create a personalized weight loss plan. Now you can eat smart, eat healthy, eat well and still lose all the weight you want. Optimized for your life, use the Eat This, Not That! Restaurant app behind the wheel at your regular drive-thru window, at the food tables of your favorite chain restaurant, or even in the aisles of your local supermarket! **FEATURES** CALORIE LOGGER â¢ Track calories for over 13,000 menu items and 10,000 grocery products â¢ Calculate calories burned for 230 exercises and activities â¢ Trust the most accurate formulas available to determine caloric budgets â¢ Easily adjust calorie budgets to customize your plan â¢ View calorie information by day and week, so you can see the short â¢ View your daily calorie budget (consumed, burned off, remaining) on the home screen â¢ Use the instant add feature to quickly enter calorie and workout info â¢ The food database updates automatically. No need to re-download to access new and improved content EAT THIS, NOT THAT! PREMIUM CONTENT â¢ Discover simple food swaps that'll save you hundreds of calories â¢ Learn restaurant survival strategies to make the smartest choice every time â¢ See the best and worst foods in America WEIGHT TRACKER â¢ Record and chart your weight loss progress RESTAURANT SURVIVAL STRATEGIES â¢ View nutritional grades for over 13,000 adult and kid menu items â¢ See a summary of the best and worst options for each restaurant COMPARISON CART â¢ Put two foods head-to-head to see which is the healthier option*Certain activities on this app may be licensed under one or more claims of U.S. Patent No. 6,585,516.

reviews.title: Good, but lot\'s of room for improvement.
reviews.comment: I got this ap based in large part on how much I enjoyed their books. Unfortunately, it seems that that book sitting on my bookshelf gets updated about as much as this ap. Menus are constantly changing, and I expect this ap to keep up a little. There are also typos in a lot of the entries for restaurant items. A single item will be listed more than once with different calories and a different grade. That being said, still a good ap that will absolutely help you make healthier choices at fast food joints.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: But needs more features and an update.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unintuitive and difficult to use.
reviews.comment: This app is unintuitive and difficult to use. A paid version of this app should have more intuitive menus and should include a way to sort by carbs.
reviews.author: Chris Spalding

reviews.title: Not bad.  Not great.
reviews.comment: I\'m a huge fan of the \"Eat This, Not That!\" books and website, so when I saw an easy way to take ETNT with me, I jumped on it.  You\'ll get a top swaps menu for most of the popular chain restaurants in America, featuring two or three swaps you can make, and a letter rating for most (but not all) of the foods and drinks served at these places.  I love the letter rating system, but it\'s deficient in some places.  (Why aren\'t the drinks at Starbucks rated?  That\'s their main draw.)  What you won\'t get are the awesome lists that can be found on the website.  What if I wanted to take my 50 Best Snack Foods list with me?  Too bad.  It also has an option to track calories, but I don\'t use it because it\'s clumsy.  I wish I could go from looking the food up on the grade menu straight to adding it to my calorie counter, but I have to go back to the menu screen, load up the calorie counter, then look up my food and add it.  Would definitely like to see some more restaurants.  Caribou Coffee has over 400 locations, Atlanta Bread Company has 110; take a guess who gets the nutritional analysis.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: You can get the same info at the restaurants for free.
reviews.comment: Not impressed at all! There are very little choices and suggestions on this app. You can stand and look at the restaurant menu and have a better idea of what to eat. Most restaurants offer a calorie and nutrition brochure for free. I finished reading the app in 15 minutes. I thought buying an this app would be convenient. Waste of money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Desperately needs an update.
reviews.comment: Good content, buried in an interface full of bugs. Many UI elements don\'t line up or properly load. Text often doesn\'t have spaces or paragraph breaks (looks like it was copied from a pdf and never edited). For a paid app, I expected them to put some design effort into it.
reviews.author: James Paine

reviews.title: App doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I keep getting a browser pop up ad that won\'t load properly and I can\'t get around it to get back into the app. Used the email to contact the app provider and it doesn\'t work. DON\'T buy. Have the Galaxy Nexus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s good for the most restaurants but wish there was a search option for stores not listed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best app on the market
reviews.comment: Actually helps/not just another useless app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please upgrade
reviews.comment: Alot of the restraunt info says theres no data for that restraunt and the ones that do show up are out of date and there is not many choices for the restraunts. needs work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t load
reviews.comment: It looks like it would be a great app, but I can\'t get it to load anything besides the calorie tracker and option menu. Disappointing on my HTC Inspire.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on HTC Inspire
reviews.comment: Noah- so glad it works for you but it does NOT work on HTC Inspire. That is why we are giving low ratings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Don\'t know what everyone is complaining about there is nothing wrong
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love your books & love this app BUT it\'s such a memory hog! Move to SD card please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: LOVED the booked and have been waiting for this app!!
reviews.author: A Google User
